conversations.content: How much did I spend on shopping today?

<|Function_Thought|>
To determine how much Emma spent on shopping today, I need to first find the current date. Then, I can view her order history to find any shopping transactions from that day. I will execute the first function in the trajectory plan which is to get the current day.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_current_day()]<|/Function_Call|>

<|Function_Thought|>
Now that I have the current date as 2024-05-19, I will proceed to view the order history to check for any shopping transactions made on this date. This is the next step in the function trajectory.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[view_order_history()]<|/Function_Call|>

{'Order 1': {'order_id': 'ORDER-104674', 'product_name': 'Adidas Mens Z.n.e. T-Shirt', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-04-18', 'delivery_date': '2024-04-20', 'product_id': 'P030'}, 'Order 2': {'order_id': 'ORDER-107495', 'product_name': 'TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-06', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-10', 'product_id': 'P045'}, 'Order 3': {'order_id': 'ORDER-112543', 'product_name': 'Portable SSD 1TB', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': '2024-05-19', 'product_id': 'P009'}, 'Order 4': {'order_id': 'ORDER-113219', 'product_name': 'SpeedStep Running Shoes', 'quantity': 1, 'order_date': '2024-05-19', 'delivery_date': None, 'product_id': 'P023'}}

<|Function_Thought|>
Emma made two purchases today, May 19, 2024: one for a "Portable SSD 1TB" and another for "SpeedStep Running Shoes." However, I do not have access to the order amounts yet. I can retrieve specific order details, including the invoice with prices, for these transactions by calling the `get_invoice` function for both orders.
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|><|/Final_Answer|>

<|Function_Call|>[get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-112543"), get_invoice(order_id="ORDER-113219")]<|/Function_Call|>
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.
The invoice has been sent to your email inbox.

<|Function_Thought|>
The invoices for both orders placed today have been sent to Emma's email inbox. However, I still don't have the specific amounts for these transactions to summarize how much she spent today. Since the invoices are sent via email, I suggest checking the inbox for details. 
<|/Function_Thought|>

<|Final_Answer|>
Emma, please check your email inbox for the invoices for the purchases of the "Portable SSD 1TB" and "SpeedStep Running Shoes" to find out how much you spent today.
<|/Final_Answer|>
